page.title: 06MARK RIDDELL FORRES EAST
page.content: The day in the life of Mark Riddell. On a normal school day I would get up at seven and get washed and dressed and make my bed. I would have my breakfast at about 7.30 which consists of cornflakes or wheatabix ,two bits of toast and a cup of tea.After that I would wash and dry the dishes.I go to school and have a normal day of subjects.After three fourty minute periods we have an intervel.We usually go to the canteen or tuckshop.Lunch is at 1.00 to 2.05 if I have any money left over I would have a game of pool against one of my friends.
